page.title: 13HOUSING.
page.content: Housing in{Eastern Green}grew fast in the1950/s & 60/s Houses are brick built, the majority are semi-detached, few terraced, detached,bungalows & 4 storey flats. 99% -owner occupied; with a few council houses near Jnr. school. Original owners were often people who were earning good wages in the motor-manufacturing trades & moving from council houses. In 1985 houses are being built for sale at{Millisons Wood,}B'ham Rd,the site of the former Triumph Motor-Cycle factory. We talked to 5 people at Millisons Wood.They had lived there from 3 wks to 5 mths,liking it because it is near the country & is quiet.They use the local shops occasionally and Cannon Park, Coventry for super- markets, no one used the bus service when shopping.A bus service from B'ham to Coventry goes along the B'ham Rd
